text: As a working mom, I always worried about my children well being, whether they are in good hands, stay happy, healthy and can learn some good values when I’m busy with my work. I can’t thank the teachers, educators and the staff at Haven Schoolhouse enough for their passion and thoughtfulness in taking care / teaching my kids. I can entrust them and hence able to focus on work during weekdays. My children look forward to go to school everyday! Thank you teachers and aunties once again!

I love. All the teachers very good care of my Michelle . She will listen to all the teachers.  teach my daughter  very well and hear all the teachers say . I hope my daughter Michelle can be good girl in school and at home ... . Teacher very good and friendly. Good staff

Great childcare for my kids. Teachers are patient, friendly and coach my kids well in personal care and academic. Principal is always around to assist whenever in need and provide parents with any 1st hand information. Cook serve good nutrition vegetarian food for kids and aunty keep the place clean at all times. Highly recommended childcare.

I feel really appreciate and thankful and for the patience all's the teachers staff with nice make I feel bless trust to joining the school as parent I feel bless to choose the Haven school for all's my children's.
teachers are all very supportive and caring towards my child and takes care of him very well!!
